Text:
Nothing like using standard file types?

Pictures in BMP? - What is this the 1980's? BMP was designed for windows 1.0
Vidoes? something callde 3G2 format? sure it can be played on VLC but why bother when AVI works fine for that quality? heck Animated GIF would be suitable quality.
3g2 is the video format phones send so its most likely a unconverted file
I should have read this remarks before trying to download this shit ...
